remarks: Rewrite the limit of the sequence ` G ` in terms of the log-Gamma function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2017.)
statement:
lgamgulm.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. NN ) $.
lgamgulm.u $e |- U = { x e. CC | ( ( abs ` x ) <_ R /\ A. k e. NN0 ( 1 / R ) <_ ( abs ` ( x + k ) ) ) } $.
lgamgulm.g $e |- G = ( m e. NN |-> ( z e. U |-> ( ( z x. ( log ` ( ( m + 1 ) / m ) ) ) - ( log ` ( ( z / m ) + 1 ) ) ) ) ) $.
lgamgulm2 $p |- ( ph -> ( A. z e. U ( log_G ` z ) e. CC /\ seq 1 ( oF + , G ) ( ~~>u ` U ) ( z e. U |-> ( ( log_G ` z ) + ( log ` z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d R k m x z $.
$d U m z $.
$d k m x $.
$d m ph x z $.
